Obsidian/Obsidian---The-Right-Way.title: Obsidian - The Right Way
Obsidian/Obsidian---The-Right-Way.content:
AI Obsidian Gold

1. Plugins for Obsidian
Obsidian Plugins (Settings ‚Üí Community Plugins ‚Üí Browse):

Templater by SilentVoid
Dataview by Michael Brenan
DataCards by Sophokles187
Dataview Serializer by Sebastien Dubois
Smart Connections by Brian Petro
Style Settings by mgmeyers

Don‚Äôt forget to click Enable after you click Install and they get done. Obsidian doesn‚Äôt auto-enable community plugins.
There are others, but they are more niche, and I‚Äôm looking to get you started with minimal easy steps that do the most for you.

2. Themes for Obsidian
ITS Theme is a gorgeous, flat, matte theme with black, grays, and deep reds that are easy on the eyes with an amazing font. Images of mine attached for your viewing.
Obsidian Themes: (Settings ‚Üí Appearance ‚Üí Themes ‚Üí Manage)


ITS Theme by SIRvb - is the one I use, I can‚Äôt recommend it enough.


Minimal by kepano - is recommend by a lot of power users.


AnuPpuccin by Anubis - Looks fantastic, but it has a TON of color pallets to choose from.


Obsidianite by Benny Guo - is gorgeous, it‚Äôs a dark one with black, purples, shades of blue, and a icy blue font color.



3. Local AI & Embedding
We need to get you a local AI setup going to handle embedding. Embedding is‚Ä¶ well, who better to explain a concept/tool/method we‚Äôll use AI for, than an AI itself? I‚Äôll let GPT handle this one.
Feel free to skip the quoted What is Embedding section, it‚Äôs only here just in case you want to know what it is, and how it works, so you understand why people (and AI) love it and add it.
What is Embedding? (A RAG concept)

Imagine your notes and documents are a giant library‚Äîtons of pages, topics, thoughts, ideas. Now imagine you have a friend who‚Äôs really good at finding things, even if you don‚Äôt describe them perfectly or remember the exact wording. You say:
"Find something about how I fixed my server issue last month"
and instead of searching only for those exact words, this friend understands what you‚Äôre asking and pulls up the right information‚Äîeven if you actually wrote resolved nginx timeout instead. That friend is an Embedding model.
At its core, an Embedding is a way of converting text into numbers. But not random numbers‚Äînumbers arranged so that similar ideas end up close together.
Input: Words, sentences, documents. Any text, including formats like markdown, HTML, etc.
Embedding: Turns those into points in a 3D-like map that is thousands of dimensions. It‚Äôs called a vector map.
Embedded Numbers: Cause the AI to understand that, similar meaning = close together, different meaning = far apart. If dinosaur is 0.8765091, then lizard might be 0.8765008, and cloud might be 0.2144313.
This Allows: The AI you talk to, to go from comparing text as raw letters, to actually comparing meaning.
What does this mean for Obsidian?
If you have 2,000 notes, traditional searching only finds matches if the words are exact. If you search for Dinosaur, you get the word Dinosaur, that‚Äôs it. But asking AI to search after embedding, now you get a list of all the dinosaurs you wrote about, that snippet of how raptors became chickens that you saved, and that reminder you set to wear your T-Rex costume to your friends party. The more context you give the AI when asking to search for you, the better results you will get after embedding, normal searches do not come close to this.
Final Example:
You tell your AI chat in Obsidian: Show me my notes about troubleshooting network errors.
But you only wrote this in the note: I fixed connectivity issues with my router by adjusting DNS.
A normal search might miss that and come back with 0 results. But with embeddings your AI sees:

network errors
connectivity issues
router DNS problem

All 3 of those live next to each other in the embedding space so the AI says "These ideas are related, I will pull this information for the user."
Final Summary of Embedding:
Embeddings turn your notes into meaning-based search, so you can find things even when you don‚Äôt remember the exact words you used.

ollama + Qwen3:

Go to ollama.com/download and download then install the Windows version. This allows you to run open AI models locally. This will hit your GPU/CPU/RAM a bit, but only when the model is actively doing things and not sitting idle.
Open PowerShell (Preferably Windows Terminal with PowerShell 7 as your console, cause we‚Äôre big boy IT guys now), type ollama and send, it should print a list of help commands if it installed and is running.
Same terminal run ollama pull qwen3-embedding:8b and ollama will download the 8 billion parameter embedding model by Qwen3 (Google but open source).
Make sure ollama desktop is running, if it is just minimize it, don‚Äôt close it. When minimized it should ‚Äúclose‚Äù the window and still be running in the task bar with your other little icons.


4. Smart Connections Chat-Bot + Open Router API (The Big Brain) + Embedding with Ollama
Now you‚Äôre cooking, you‚Äôre so close to having an amazing AI setup in your Obsidian which is going to help a LOT, trust. But, how is embedding going to help if you can‚Äôt actually talk to the AI that handles it? That‚Äôs right, embedding AI models aren‚Äôt meant for chatting and normal tasks, they are very specialized and trained to do one thing, and do it very well. Now we need an actual LLM model. Not only are we getting a big boy LLM your PC can‚Äôt even handle, we‚Äôre going to do it for free.
We need to setup an Open Router account for you, then edit the Smart Connections plugin setting in Obsidian. There‚Äôs other settings you can tweak in it, but for now we‚Äôre going to just get your AI‚Äôs up and running.
OpenRouter:

Go to openrouter.ai/ and make a free account. Make yourself an API key, name it what you want, I‚Äôd recommend Obsidian Chat just so you know what it is. Copy the API key and slap it into Notepad or something for now. Pretty sure it‚Äôs gone as soon as you close the little API window, you‚Äôll most likely have to make another if you lose it before using it.

Smart Connections:
2. Go back to Obsidian and go to Settings ‚Üí Smart Chat ‚Üí Scroll down to the Model section.
3. Chat Model Platform: Select Open Router
4. API Key: Put in the Open Router API key you generated earlier with your Open Router Account.
5. Refresh Models: Click the Refresh Models button.
Now we need a sick nasty big boy LLM that is good at chatting, reasoning, taking instruction, and general use
OpenRouter, again:

Go to the models page or just use my link: openrouter.ai/models
On the left side panel expand Prompt pricing and drag the right circle all the way to the left circle. This should only show free models, which is what we want. Be sure to double check each one, sometimes they accidentally add paid ones in.
On the left side panel expand Context length While we can use smaller models, I would say use one with at least 128K context. So move the circle for the slider up to the first line past 64K and take a look at the models.
Note: Unfortunately at some point to do this efficiently you will need to learn about models to some extent, take your time reading them as different models are designed for different things. For example, TNG: R1T Chimera is mostly used for roleplaying, whereas Mistral: Devstral 2 2512 is used for coding and dev work.
My Recommendations: At this time, 12/10/2025, I would say choose Amazon: Nova 2 Lite (free), Tongyi DeepResearch 30B A3B (free), OpenAI: gpt-oss-120b (free), TNG: DeepSeek R1T2 Chimera (free), or Qwen: Qwen3 235B A22B (free). Out of those 5, I would probably try DeepSeek R1T2, Qwen3 235B, and gpt-oss-120b first, in that order.
Once you know what model you want, head back into Smart Connections Settings.

Smart Connections again:

Go to Chat Model and click the empty box. Scroll down and find the one you want, click it.
Go down to Smart Environment and click on Show Environment Settings.
Scroll down to Smart Sources.
Find Embedding model platform and click the box beside it. Choose Ollama (Local).
Under that you should see Embedding Model, click the box beside it and choose qwen3-embedding:8b.

5. Success!
That is it! You should now have a fully functioning embedding system that works automatically any time you make changes to a note. If you have a lot of notes you might hear your GPU spin up for a while as the embedding model we‚Äôre running locally uses your GPU to do everything. So don‚Äôt do this initially if you‚Äôre fixing to play a game and you have a bunch of notes.
To actually talk to the AI, look on your left side bar in Obsidian and find the icon that looks like a conversation box from a comic with a smile face in it.  If you hover over it you should get a text popup that shows Open: Smart Chat. Click that and a new tab will open. You can expand here, name your chats, start a new fresh one, check your chat history, open chat settings, and more. But that‚Äôs another topic for another time.
You did it, this guide was a lot to read, but I went step-by-step, and together our efforts should have you a gorgeous theme, full AI with powerful LLM‚Äôs backing them up, and a full local embedding system up and running.
6. What‚Äôs Next?
I will have more guides coming soon, such as how to write better notes, different ways to make use of the AI, how to use the plugins we installed earlier, and more! So look forward to it and I hope you enjoy your new Obsidian setup friends.

X-Clash/Union-Duel-VS-Guide.title: Union Duel VS Guide
X-Clash/Union-Duel-VS-Guide.content:
Weekly VS Guide
Welcome
This guide is not perfect. It‚Äôs not a end-all be all. You don‚Äôt have to follow it perfectly, you‚Äôre not going to memorize it all immediately, and things may change in the future. This is a guide meant to get you going and have you on the best possible path currently going forward.
Special thanks to Animality from the Official X-Clash Discord server as most of the information came from his guides and videos.

Day 1: Intelligence Training

Intelligence quest - BEFORE THIS DAY STARTS, perform intelligence quest using stamina, but DO NOT collect them or tap the red dots just yet, open them once the VS event starts.
Dispatch your teams to gather resources (food, iron, gold) hours before Server Reset.
Stamina, Mystic Beast Breakthrough and EXP Potion - use then all at once during Arms Race: Mystic Beast Training .
Hero EXP - use them during Arms Race: Enhance Hero.


Day 2: Castle Construction

In this day, do not perform any Intelligence Quest
Dispatch Legendary Wagons - Not connected to Arms Race, you can do this anytime.
Gold Tavern Quest - Not connected to Arms Race, you can do this anytime.
Survivor Recruitment - Located in Hero > Obtain Hero > Survivor Recruitment. Not connected to Arms Race, you can do this anytime.
Building Upgrade - You should do this during Arms Race: Construction City.

Note: You can upgrade any building anytime but DO NOT open the gift wrap when they are finished. Open them only during Arms Race or during Arms Race + Construction Day of the VS events. This will give you a lot of points during such events. On this Day, save up intelligence quest again, for Day3 of the event.

Day 3: Technology Research

Mystic Beast Mark Chest - Save them all for this day, do not open them and only do it in the Day3 of the VS events. Not connected to Arms Race, you can do this anytime.
Energy Crystals - These crystals should only be exclusive to Day3 of the VS events. Save them all only for this day. Use these crystals during Arms Race: Technology Research.


Day 4: Hero Upgrade

Hero Shards - Not connected to Arms Race, you can do this anytime.
Skill Exp Book - Not connected to Arms Race, you can do this anytime.
Hero Recruit and Hero Exp - Do this both during Arms Race: Enhance Hero

Note: In this Day, save up intelligence quest again, for Day5 of the event.

Day 5: Full Preparation

Do all of the guides mentioned from Day1 to Day4 combined. Do them all during their Arms Race.
Soldiers Training - Before this Day, DO NOT over train too much, save resources and speedups to train for this day.


Day 6: Defeat the Enemy

If you have any wounded troops in your hospital the day before this one, do not heal them yet, do it only once this day arrives.
Killing soldiers grants a lot of massive points depending on their level.
Having your troops killed also grants points.
Be vigilant, be smart and stay sharp on this day.


Day 7: Rest Day

Save everything, especially Intelligence Quest for Day 1 of the VS events again.
